title: Spending The Night With The Inexperienced You
alternative_title: Mijuku na Kimi to Yoru wo Kasaneru ; Mijukuna Kimi to Yoru wo Kasaneru ; Spending The Night With The Inexperienced You ; 未熟なきみと夜を重ねる
status: Mijuku na Kimi to Yoru wo Kasaneru ; Mijukuna Kimi to Yoru wo Kasaneru ; Spending The Night With The Inexperienced You ; 未熟なきみと夜を重ねる
description:
Description :
        Hiroyuki's father's business is going bankrupt, and the resulting financial issues have him concerned about his college prospects. At a family funeral, Hiroyuki meets Wataru, a flashy model.He's drawn to this man, who appears to live in a different world. After accidentally triggering him, though, Hiroyuki is made an outrageous offer.Unsure of Wataru's true motives, he accepts the proposition.Gradually, he begins to realize that Wataru's a lonely soul.Wataru, for all his arrogance, doesn't want their relationship to end...A story about a twisted, sweet first love featuring two awkward men who, by all accounts, shouldn't get along.+
